results.title: Chinese Court Rejects Canadian’s Appeal of Death Sentence for Drug Trafficking
results.abstract: Robert Lloyd Schellenberg initially received 15 years in prison for methamphetamine trafficking. But he was handed a death sentence in a one-day retrial in 2019.
